# Process samples to a list that can be included to a dataframe

Process samples to a list that can be included to a dataframe

## Usage

``` r
samples_to_list(object, par_name = "y_pred", n_samples = NULL)
```

## Arguments

- object:

  Stanfit object containing variable `par_name` or matrix with rows
  representing samples, columns representing variables.

- par_name:

  Name of variable to extract when `object` is a stanfit object. Default
  to `"y_pred"` (variable containing predictions).

- n_samples:

  How many samples to return. Default (=NULL) to all samples.

## Value

List of vector of samples

## Examples

``` r
samples_to_list(matrix(rnorm(1e3), nrow = 1e2))
#> [[1]]
```
